newsitem.title: USA: Summit Medical acquires C.L. McIntosh.
newsitem.headline: Summit Medical acquires C.L. McIntosh.

text.p: Summit Medical Systems Inc said Thursday it acquired C.L. McIntosh & Associates Inc, a medical and clinical trial management services company, in a stock transaction.

Summit Medical said it issued 976,453 of its common shares to McIntosh stockholders as part of the pooling-of-interests deal. McIntosh will become a wholly owned subsidiary of Summit Medical, the company said.
Summit Medical said it will take a charge in the fourth quarter to cover expenses related to the merger. It will also include McIntosh's operating results in its quarterly report.
Summit Medical provides information services to the health care industry. Its stock closed down 3/8 Thursday at 7-1/4.
